page.title: 12DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: We get up inm the morning at around 7.00 am we have breatfast which usually consists of toast or cereals and a drink. We get dressed and leave the house to go to school. We travel to school by bus or train and are supposed to arrive no later than 8.45 am. We go to registration where our form teacher checks to see if anyone is absent. At 9., we all go down to the hall for assembly where we say prayers. Then we gto our first lesson which goes on till 10.30 am when we snacks or drinks. Then other lesson a. At 11.45 am we have dinner. After this we have registration and our 3rd lesson finishes at 2.15 pm when we have another break. at 3.30 pm wo home. Once we have get home there areumber of things to do.examples going youth clubs, meeting friends, watching tlevision etc. Not forgetting homework o course.
